text:
Tanit Phoenix (born 24 September 1980) is a South African fashion model, actress and makeup artist. She is known for her swimwear and lingerie photo shoots after appearing in a "Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue" in 2003 and in "GQ" magazine and "FHM" in the same year. She was born in Durban, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa.
In 2016, she married actor Sharlto Copley. They have one child.
